roleset.name: cause to feel calm or sleepy
roleset.note: LULL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lull' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1. (from lull.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: no end state
example.text: This is clearly not good news to all you people who [*T*-1]-2 sleep like babies every night, [*-2]-3 lulled [*-3] by visions of your money sitting risk-free in six-month CDs.
example.arg: by visions of your money sitting risk-free in six-month CDs

example.name: all args
example.text: John lulled Mary to sleep by talking about predicate-argument structure.
